name: federal
description: US federal campaign finance data from the Federal Election Commission (FEC), scoped to the active local region

config.description: US federal campaign finance data from the Federal Election Commission, filtered to the active local region's state

dataSources.contentGoal: Fetch itemized individual contributions to federal candidates and committees within the local region's state
hints: Free API key from api.open.fec.gov/developers (DEMO_KEY for testing)
1,000 calls/hour default rate limit; 7,200/hr available on request
${stateCode} placeholder is resolved at runtime from the active local region's stateCode
Use two_year_transaction_period to scope by election cycle

dataSources.contentGoal: Fetch independent expenditures for/against federal candidates by PACs and Super PACs
hints: Schedule E = independent expenditures by PACs/Super PACs
Note: IEs are harder to filter by state â€” they target candidates who represent a state

dataSources.contentGoal: Bulk download of individual contributions for the 2025-2026 election cycle, filtered to the local region's state
hints: Very large file (~4GB for a full cycle) but filtered by STATE during parse
${stateCode} placeholder is resolved at runtime from the active local region's stateCode
SUB_ID is the unique transaction identifier
